renderpass.code:
// variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/tdcXW2
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) { mi }
renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code: void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) { mi }
renderpass.name: Buffer A

renderpass.code:
// ( -17 if injecting C(U) )

#define C(U) texture( iChannel0, U/R.y + vec2( t, 15-t/16 ) / 16. ).w - .5//
#define mi                                                                 \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy; int t = 9*iFrame;                             \
    O =  mix( texture(iChannel1, 1.02 *U/R -.01 ) * .97,                   \
              ++O,   step (R.y, length(U+U-R) )                            \
                   * ( .6 + .6 * cos( 8.*iTime  + vec4(0,23,21,0)  ) )     \
                   * clamp( 1.- R.y*(C(U)), 0.,1.)  );                    //
                  /* clamp( 1. - H* mix( C(U), C(U), fract(t) ) , 0.,1.) )// morph





// --- 249 char variant ( but slightly different colors )

#define C(U) texture( iChannel0, U/R.y + vec2( t, 15-t/16 ) / 16. ).w - .5//
#define mainImage(O,U)                                                     \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy; int t = 9*iFrame;                             \
    O =  mix( texture(iChannel1, 1.02 *U/R -.01 ) * .97,                   \
              .5 + .5 * cos( 8.*iTime  + vec4(0,23,21,0)  )  ,             \
              step (R.y, length(U+U-R) )                                   \
              * clamp( 1.- R.y*(C(U)), 0.,1.) )                            \
             /* clamp( 1. - H* mix( C(U), C(U), fract(t) ) , 0.,1.) ) // morph

*/
renderpass.name: Common
